transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Good morning Pawan bhai, kaise hain aap?

Customer: Bas badhiya, boliye.

Executive: Main bhi badhiya hun sir. Keh raha hun ki ye nahi aa rahe hain kya aajkal Parag bhai?

Customer: Nahi, wo actually kahin bahar gaye hue the.

Customer: Aur do teen din se aisa hi hai. Schedule bahut kuch client ka kuch meeting vagera mein pade hue hain. Ek orders tha to unke usme lage pade hain. Next week Tuesday kuch aane wale hain aisa kuch hai. Kyunki hamara bhi kya hai ki kuch vacancy thi, unka bhi thoda fulfillment karna tha. Ek aapka bhi tha, do teen cheeze abhi pending padi hai. Abhi wo aaye to kuch hue aage usme aisa hai.

Executive: Aaj bhi nahi aaye kya?

Customer: Na, aaj bhi nahi aaye.

Executive: Sir, dikkat ho rahi hai. Problem ye ho rahi hai sir dekho main ek cheez aapko bata raha hun. Maine Parag bhai ko maine message mein bhi likha hai but wo dekhenge tab na. Ab jaise hamari services hai, theek hai. To hamari jo services hai wo already hamari ek ko band ho rahi hai. Theek hai. Hume chahiye hota hai kam se kam 20 se 25 din pehle ka time. Theek hai. Kyunki aapki jo profile chal rahi hai us profile mein product hai aapke. Purani profile hai koi aisi nahi hai ki nayi profile bani hui ho. Ki nahi yaar ekdam se nayi profile hamari bani hui hai, theek hai. 9 saal se IndiaMART mein connected hain, theek hai. To 9 saal purani profile hai. Kabhi bhi renewal hota hai ya koi bhi nayi service lete hain na Pawan bhai, to hum log profile ko dobara se pura proper tarike se banate hain. Kahin koi cheez ki kami ho, kuch bhi ho matlab hamari jo production team hai na wo ispe kaam karti hai. Ispe main kaam nahi karta hun. Ispe kaam karti hai production team, theek hai. Aur production team ke paas mein already aapko bhi pata hai sir dekho limited logo ki team hoti hai. Theek hai. Client base hai hamare paas zyada. To unko bhi chahiye hota hai kam se kam 20 se 25 din ka time kyunki wo same day pe to karke nahi host kar sakte hain profile ko. Theek hai. Aur 20 se 25 din pehle agar hum nahi dalenge usko karne ke liye to wo ho bhi nahi payega. Dusri cheez aapki services ho jayegi downgrade. Jitni mehnat aap abhi kiye ho aur usse pehle jo mehnat kari hai humne jo profile humne bana karke rakhi hai na wo puri puri uski listing down chali jayegi sir. To us cheez ka to dekho benefit hai nahi apne ko. Theek hai. Kyunki agar hum itna purane supplier hain as an IndiaMART pe ya market mein bhi to log humko jante to hain hi ki bhai ye company hai to itne saal se kaam kar rahi hai, same industry pe kaam kar rahi hai, same product bech rahi hai. Theek hai. Ab uski jo listing abhi top pe dikh rahi hai star mein wo top se hat kar ke bilkul ekdam niche chali jaye to kya hi fayda hoga uska. Aapko bhi mehnat zyada hi lagegi normal si cheez hai kyunki wo to kar denge renewal unka kaam khatam hota hai.

Executive: To business aap sahi mange kyunki service aap use karte ho, hai na. Wo wali cheez sabse badi problem hai yahan pe sir. Aaj already 13 ho gayi hai. Theek hai. Abhi beech mein kuch din off vagera hoga jaise Saturday Sunday hamara off hota hai. Un dino kaam hota nahi hai aapko bhi pata hai, theek hai. Fir month end aa jayega, month end mein Parag bhai bhi busy ho jayenge ki yaar closing chal rahi hai. Closing wala kaam pehle ho jane do. Theek hai. Ab mere ko matlab ye socho aap mere se exact bole the ki main Deepawali mein Labh Pacham ke baad mein aapka renewal 100% hai. Aap befikar raho main jaise Labh Pacham mein office khulega main dusre din ja kar ke sabse pehla kaam ye karunga main aapka payment release kar dunga. Theek hai. Maine unki is baat pe rakhi, baat ki value rakhi, maine offer jo hai extend karaya, hold karaya, sab kuch kara liya, theek hai. Lad jhagad kar ke mere ko roz us cheez ke liye daant bhi pad rahi hai ki tum kyun rakhe hue ho. Jab karenge tab naye price pe kara lena, kyun purana price dena hai, kyun offer bar bar hold karwa rahe ho kyunki offer hold to hota nahi hai sir ek bar nikal gaya. Main teen bar kara chuka hun. Ab mere paas iske baad mein koi option nahi hai Pawan bhai ki main koi bhi cheez aapke liye ya Parag bhai ke liye hold karata hun. Yahi same cheez hui thi last matlab starting mein renewal generate hone se pehle maine bola tha ki sir star ka renewal karke star badha lo. Aapko cashback dilaunga us time mere paas cashback ka option chal raha tha. Maine bola tha cashback dilaunga MDC mein pura paisa nahi dena padega, kam paisa dena padega jitna thoda 20 22000 25000 kam nahi hota hai sir. Theek hai utna amount aapka kam ho jayega na aap to mere se discount mangoge hi baad mein. Usse achcha hai ki wahan pe hum nahi de payenge. To wo cheez aapke liye thoda sa suitable ho jayegi ki chalo yaar theek hai isme kahin na kahin se ghuma kar ke kar diya samne wale ne. Theek hai. Ab aapki baat ki value main rakh raha hun lekin aap meri baat ki value rakh hi nahi rahe ho. Wo cheez sir bahut kharab lagti hai. Ab main ab batao main kya hi reply karu. Mere paas kal bhi mere ko meeting mein bulaya gaya isi cheez ke liye ki Avnish aapne hold karaya tha. Ye teen bar hold ho chuka hai hum nahi kar sakte hain. Saaf bata do client ko. Ab batao main kya bolu. Maine kal bhi call kiya tha, kal bhi phone nahi uthaye. Aaj call kiya aaj bhi phone nahi uthaye main. Are bhai wahi to bata raha hun ki wo hai na teen din se lagatar jo client aaya hai na koi bada order hai, theek hai unka. Aur order place ho chuka hai. Abhi party se kuch meeting thi jisko kuch ek do plant dikhane the hamare housing ke aur do. To wo usi ko leke gaye hue hain actually mein. Ab hamara mera hai actually aisa nahi hai hamara yahan pe bhi do teen kaam unke wajah se pending pada hua hai. Abhi decision unko hi lena hai wo cheez pata hai ye cheez ka. Mere ko lena hota to main Avnish bhai aapko bhi pata hai main turant hi le leta isme kuch hai nahi main puri use kar raha hun ye service. Wo to pata hi hai mere ko aur karna unko bhi aisa nahi hai ki unko nahi karna hai. Karna unko bhi hai, theek hai. Lekin ab yahi cheez hai unka bas pending kis cheez pe chal raha hai unka pending mere khyal se isi cheez pe tha ki Hiren bhai se ek bar baat karni thi unko. Haan, theek hai. Wo bhi haan wo bhi theek wo bhi theek. Ab mere paas pehle kya tha mere paas Hiren bhai ka number tha to main khud bhi call kar leta tha. Ab wo galti se mere se ho gaya delete. Ab mere paas keval bacha hai Parag bhai ka. Ab wo nahi phone uthate to main kya hi karu. At least aap itna kar sakte ho aap mere ko ek bar Hiren bhai ka number do ki main unko bhi ek bar inform kar dunga sir. Dekho meri end se mera kaam ho jana chahiye ki main inform kar diya, theek hai taki baad mein koi cheez fase nahi. Theek hai wo aapko bhi pata hai Parag bhai ko bhi pata hai. Jaise aap mere ko bata rahe ho na. Haan, mere ko jaise aapne ye cheez batai na wo ek bar Hiren bhai se bhi baat kar lo. Even Parag bhai ko to aapne choda hua hai. Mere ko Hiren bhai ka kyunki mere paas Hiren bhai ka number miss ho gaya hai sir. Haan to main number aapko bhej deta hun. Haan please aap bhej do to main ek bar unko connect karke main unko bata dunga sari cheezon ke liye. To unko bhi dikkat nahi hogi wo bhi samajh jayenge to wo ek bar baat kar lenge. Clear bata dena aisa nahi Avnish bhai dekho main aapko main main aapko to be frankly bata raha hun main as a ek employee nahi bata raha hun kyunki ye dekho main bhi hun is sales theek hai marketing main ye nahi hai ki ye company mein kaam karke aaya hun main aur 9 saal se yahi industries mein hun main bhi. Ye jab renewal vagera hota hai meri aap main company ka naam dunga to aapko pata chal hi jayega wo company ka. Aapne Photonics naam suna hoga shayad. Photonics haan. Watertech Private Limited ye Gandhinagar mein hi hai lights manufacturing. Pehle main wahan pe hi tha. To wahan pe bhi jo hamare director the to wo unka bhi yahi chakkar rehta tha. Renewal ke time pe bahut thoda bahut delay ho jata tha kuch discount ke liye kuch ye vagera. Matlab wo cheez alag hai but usme kya hota hai do impression padti hai ek to pehli to ye apni ek galat aapne jo bola ek baat nahi rehti. Theek hai. Aur dusri cheez bhi koi koi cheez man lo ki discontinue ho gayi fir baad mein wapas se karwana hai wo cheez wo bahut critical ho jata hai. Dimag na aap logon ka wo hoga kyunki bhai aap se business hi manga jayega, theek hai fir aapko utni hi zyada mehnat karni pad jayegi. Dikkat to isi cheez ki hai na. Ab ye cheez ye log nahi samajhte hain kyunki in logon ki busy schedule itna rehta hai ki wo dhyan hi nahi de pate. Abhi ye cheez khud use kar rahe ho na to unko samajh mein aa jayega. Theek hai. Pehle jaise Parag bhai karte the to pata rehta tha to hamesha pehle ke pehle kar dete the ab utna dhyan nahi de pate hain abhi to mere khyal se. Ek saal se almost mere ko pata hai jab se ye kuch Boni vagera tha yahan pe to Boni ne shayad teen mahine ho gaye almost chhod diya, theek hai. Boni bhai ne thoda sa alag scenario tha sir main unse jab bhi baat kiya hun na to wo matlab har cheez ka decision khud hi ki nahi mere hath pe hai main kara dunga aur fir kuch hota tha nahi kabhi bhi. Na na na main to clear hun dekho mere hath mein ye cheez hai ye aisa nahi hai but ye payment ka maine nahi rakha hai cheez. Payment wali cheez mein kya hota hai wo to payment ka maine unke hand pe rakha hai. Baki service renewal karwani hai kuch nayi service add karni hai ye sab mere hath mein hai, theek hai. Kyunki service mere ko hi use karni hai ye cheez. Service se performance main to nikalta hun, theek hai. Baki ka mere ko pata nahi tha wo Boni bhi tha nikalta tha Parag bhai the wo nikalte the ki nahi nikalte the mere ko itna idea nahi hai par main to kafi business kar raha hai isse main jhoot nahi bol raha hun aapko bahut clearly bata raha hun. Aap bahut achche se use karte ho aur maine jo jo cheez aapko boli aapne har cheez kari hai. Koi aisi cheez nahi hai jo aapne nahi ki ho aisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Aap ek bar bas ek bar number bhej dena Hiren bhai ka main ek bar. Haan main Hiren bhai ka number to aapko dal hi deta hun bas par clearly bahut bata hi dena ki jo bhi do teen din bache ho char din bache ho aaj ka hi din hai jo bhi whatever hai bahut clearly bata dena. Nahi nahi main bilkul usi hisab se baat kar lunga main isi wajah se abhi aapko call kiya maine kaha ek bar aap se mangunga to aap de doge number. Are nahi main to dekho maine to ek do bar baat kari, theek hai abhi last mein bhi baat kari maine wahi bola ki bhai ek bar jo bhi hai unse baat kar lo bhale ek man lo ki bhai 15 din 10 din kuch aage piche ho raha hai to bhi bata do unko to unko pata rahe. Clear hoti hai na sir. Haan nahi bhi kabhi kya hota hai ki bhai dekho aap deal aap kar rahe ho, theek hai humse aapko bhi aage management mein answer dena padta hai, theek hai. Abhi aap aisa bologe ki nahi main teen din mein karwa lunga mere se answer bola ki teen din mein teen din ke jagah ek week ho gaya to fir sunna to aapko hi padega na. Wahi cheez ho rahi hai na sir aur yahan pe kya hai sir dekho ye aisi company hai na jisme board of directors baithte hain aisa to hai nahi ki single us pe proprietor ship pe chal rahi hai. Listed company hai. Theek hai har cheez ka approval jata hai uska document banta hai ki bhai is cheez ka approval gaya itne ka approval gaya, theek hai aur jis pe jis bhi profile pe ek bar jata hai wo dobara nahi dete hain us pe. Kisi ko nahi milta hai. Wo to ye hai ki main itna purana hun yahan pe aur purane client hain is wajah se main lad jhagad kar ke jaise na kaise karke le leta hun ki chalo theek hai yaar koi baat nahi thoda sa upar niche hota hai cheeze koi dikkat nahi hai lekin itna nahi hota sir ki teen teen bar main lu aur main fail ho jau us jagah pe. Fir pata hai fir mere baat ki matlab company meri wording pe sawal uthati hai ki bhai tum hi baat nahi kar pa rahe ho sahi se. Haan. Dikkat isi cheez ki hai. Nahi nahi samajh gaya main is cheez ko samajh raha hun dekhiye main aisa nahi bolunga ki main nahi samajh raha hun us cheez ko. Main isliye aapko bata raha hun jo bhi hai main neutral hoke hi bata raha hun ki jo bhi hai aapko bahut clearly bata do to wo cheez aapko bhi clear ho jayegi unko bhi clear ho jayegi. Aap ye bhi puch lena ki bhai ab aap do teen din mein agar nahi kar pa rahe ho to mere ko time bata do kitne din mein karoge uske baad ek din aur nahi hoga. Wo bahut clearly bata. Mere ko wahi baat karni hai bas aur kuch nahi. Haan. Nahi to kya hoga discontinue ke baad mein wapas se karke ye sab karna wo bahut critical ho jayegi aur ye bhi bhul jao. Sahi batau kar hi nahi payenge. Purani service chahiye ye service already band ho chuki hai. Ye to discontinue ho chuki hai actually, theek hai. Ab yahi cheez jo che category chalate hain na ye che category ka agar ek location ke hisab se le lenge 10 10 location ke hisab se na to khud nahi karenge Parag bhai mana kar denge ki bhai mat karao rehne do renewal. Main sahi bata raha hun aapko kyunki wo ek category ka price hi ₹1 lakh hai. ₹6 lakh seedha seedha ho gaya che category run kar liya to aur ye to saste mein milti hai. Theek hai. Okay ye wali baat hai na main cheez. Koi baat nahi chalo main abhi dalta hun bhai ka number main baat karta hun. Nahi bhai ko dalta hun number chalo baat karta hun. Okay okay Pawan bhai. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART services about to downgrade.

- Renewal is pending due to executive unavailability.

- Wants to extend the renewal offer.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the renewal process.

- Executive explained the importance of timely renewal.

- Executive agreed to help with the issue.

- Executive asked customer to share Hiren bhai's number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share Hiren bhai's contact number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, subscription, services, payment
